title: The Anthony Cumia Show 2014-08-18.mp3
description:
Monday, August 18, 2014

Anthony opens the show chatting about his new life (or lack thereof) working from home, an error over the weekend that led into a "radio war" with Ron and Fez, and introduces the newest member of TACS team named "Rat". After a "special" call from Bobo, Ant brings up the chaos in Ferguson, we watch a video of the overnight mayhem as well as one of Michael Brown before the shooting, he goes into Dr. Michael Baden's autopsy report, and then discusses how news reporters are handling this story in general. Lady Di gets through the phone lines for another "special" call to talk about her roommate Bill?s death, Ant examines the ?the fire challenge? and the "ice bucket challenge", and he ends the show with a few more calls.
